item.title: Pythonè§£æRSSåº“feedparser
item.description:
1. å‰è¨€

Python çš„ feedparser åº“ 1ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è§£æ RSS æºã€‚

2. ä»£ç 

å®‰è£… feedparser åº“ï¼š

pip install feedparser

è·å¾—ä¸ªäººç½‘ç«™çš„å‰ 14 é¡¹ RSS çš„æ—¥æœŸğŸ“…ã€æ ‡é¢˜å’Œé“¾æ¥ğŸ”— 2, 3ï¼š

import feedparser
import datetime
from time import mktime

rss_url = 'http://xiaoledeng.github.io/index.xml'

def get_article():
    title = []
    link = []
    date = []
    rss_weekly = feedparser.parse(rss_url)
    for i in range(0,14):
        title.append(rss_weekly['entries'][i].title)
        link.append(rss_weekly['entries'][i].link)
        date.append((datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(mktime(rss_weekly['entries'][i].published_parsed)) + datetime.timedelta(hours=8)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))
    return title, link, date

title, link, date = get_article()

print('\n\nNew articles:\n\n')

for i in range(0,7):
    print(f'{date[i]}',f'{title[i]}',f'{link[i]}\n')

print('\n\nRecent articles:\n\n')

for i in range(7,14):
    print(f'{date[i]}',f'{title[i]}',f'{link[i]}\n')

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Readme

The URL of my personal website is the permanent domain xiaoledeng.github.io.

History

  • 2025.10.09, (Blog/ Publications/ Tags/ Search/ About) is updated to (Home/ Research/ Publications/ Tools/ Dao/ Life/ Tags/ Search/ About).
  • 2021.11.29, www.xiaoledeng.cn is changed to www.xiaoledeng.com
  • From 2020.01.10, my personal website is blogged by Hugo with theme Simple Style.
  • 2019.08.21 ~ 2020.01.09, my personal website was built with the website of Yin Wang.
  • 2018.04.16 ~ 2019.08.21, my personal website was built in html format with the website of Li Zhang.
  • 2017.04.12 ~ 2018.04.15, my personal website was blogged by Hexo with theme Next.
  • 2016.10.01 ~ 2017.04.12, my personal website was blogged by Pelican with theme Elegant.
